page.title: 16BAGMILL FARM - TREMATON
page.content: Bagmill farm is owned by the same family as Cumble Tor (qv) and is the two farms are run as a single entity. The family of grandfather, father and mother, son and two daughters work the farms themselves. The children attended nearby Saltash schools, travelling by a minibus provided by the school. The eldest daughter is at college in St Austell. Social activities after school are often a problem because of the isolation of the community and the lack of transport. Much of the children's spare time is thus spent on the farm.
